alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Kent; Queen Anne's; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 02 at 3:21PM EST until February 03 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. Near zero visibility possible at times. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southern New Jersey, southeast Pennsylvania, northeast Maryland and central, northern and southern Delaware. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will likely develop soonest near the New Jersey coast and Delmarva. For all areas within the advisory, unusually dense and widespread fog is possible.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
